subject: Transitions Championship (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Retief Goosen shot a six-under-par 65 to finish atop the leader board with Jim Furyk after the third round of the Transitions Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
snippet: Retief Goosen shot a six-under-par 65 to finish atop the leader board with Jim Furyk after the third round of the Transitions Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
